TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDbCommand implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示连接到数据源时执行的 SQL 语句，并由访问关系数据库的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序实现。

span.span: Represents an SQL statement that is executed while connected to a data source, and is implemented by .NET Framework data providers that access relational databases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口，用于实现命令类，表示在数据源执行的 SQL 语句的继承类。The interface enables an inheriting class to implement a Command class, which represents an SQL statement that is executed at a data source. 有关命令类的详细信息，请参阅[执行命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/executing-a-command.md)。For more information about Command classes, see [Executing a Command](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/executing-a-command.md). 应用程序不会创建的实例接口直接，但创建的实现的类实例接口。An application does not create an instance of the interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that implements the interface. 类实现必须实现其所有成员，且通常定义其他成员来添加特定于提供程序的功能。Classes that implement must implement all its members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality. 例如，接口定义方法。For example, the interface defines the method. 依次类继承此方法，而且还定义了方法。In turn, the class inherits this method, and also defines the method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的派生类的实例， ，和。The following example creates instances of the derived classes, , , and . 该示例读取数据，将写入到控制台。The example reads through the data, writing it to the console. 最后，该示例关闭，则。Finally, the example closes the , then the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlCommand Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlCommand Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.para:
若要将升级.NET Framework 数据提供程序之间的一致性，命名为窗体中的继承类其中是提供给特定的.NET Framework 数据提供程序命名空间中的所有类的统一前缀。例如，的前缀类中命名空间。继承自接口，则应实现以下构造函数： 项说明
PrvCommand() 初始化 PrvCommand 类的新实例。
(字符串 cmdText) PrvCommand 初始化的查询文本 PrvCommand 类的新实例。
（字符串 cmdText，PrvConnection 连接） PrvCommand 初始化文本的查询和 PrvConnection PrvCommand 类的新实例。
（字符串 cmdText、 PrvConnection 连接、 PrvTransaction 事务） PrvCommand 初始化文本的查询、 PrvConnection 和 PrvTransaction PrvCommand 类的新实例。

To promote consistency among .NET Framework data providers, name the inheriting class in the form where is the uniform prefix given to all classes in a specific .NET Framework data provider namespace. For example, is the prefix of the class in the namespace. When you inherit from the interface, you should implement the following constructors: Item Description
PrvCommand() Initializes a new instance of the PrvCommand class.
PrvCommand(string cmdText) Initializes a new instance of the PrvCommand class with the text of the query.
PrvCommand(string cmdText, PrvConnection connection) Initializes a new instance of the PrvCommand class with the text of the query and a PrvConnection.
PrvCommand(string cmdText, PrvConnection connection, PrvTransaction transaction) Initializes a new instance of the PrvCommand class with the text of the query, a PrvConnection, and the PrvTransaction.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Cancel() cil managed

span.span: Attempts to cancels the execution of an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有任何要取消，没有任何反应。If there is nothing to cancel, nothing happens. 但是，如果有正在执行的命令，则即使取消尝试失败，也不会生成异常。However, if there is a command in process, and the attempt to cancel fails, no exception is generated.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CommandText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.CommandText : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置对数据源运行的文本命令。

span.span: Gets or sets the text command to run against the data source.
The text command to execute.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`StoredProcedure`，将属性设置为存储过程的名称。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, set the property to the name of the stored procedure. 如果存储的过程名称中包含任何特殊字符使用转义字符语法，可能需要用户。The user may be required to use escape character syntax if the stored procedure name contains any special characters. 在调用 Execute 方法之一时，该命令将调用此存储的过程。The command will call this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods. ## Examples 下面的示例创建派生类的实例和设置的某些属性。The following example creates an instance of a derived class, and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData IDbCommand.CommandText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData IDbCommand.CommandText Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData IDbCommand.CommandText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData IDbCommand.CommandText Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在终止尝试执行命令并生成错误之前的等待时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the wait time before terminating the attempt to execute a command and generating an error.

value.span: 等待命令执行所需的时间（以秒为单位）。

span.span: The time (in seconds) to wait for the command to execute.
The default value is 30 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建派生类的实例和设置的某些属性。The following example creates an instance of a derived class, and sets some of its properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您将设置属性设置为`StoredProcedure`，应设置属性设置为存储过程的名称。When you set the property to `StoredProcedure`, you should set the property to the name of the stored procedure. 调用 Execute 方法之一时，该命令执行此存储的过程。The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods.

span.span: Creates a new instance of an object.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从继承时，.NET Framework 数据提供程序实现的强类型版本。When inheriting from , a .NET Framework data provider implements a strongly-typed version of .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 ExecuteNonQuery() cil managed

summary.span: 对 .NET Framework 数据提供程序的 对象执行 SQL 语句，并返回受影响的行数。

span.span: Executes an SQL statement against the object of a .NET Framework data provider, and returns the number of rows affected.
The number of rows affected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用执行目录操作 （例如，查询数据库的结构或创建数据库对象，如表），或更改数据库中的数据，而无需使用通过执行更新、 插入或删除语句。You can use the to perform catalog operations (for example, querying the structure of a database or creating database objects such as tables), or to change the data in a database without using a by executing UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE statements. 尽管不会返回任何行，任何输出参数或返回的数据填充映射到参数的值。Although the does not return any rows, any output parameters or return values mapped to parameters are populated with data. 对于 UPDATE、INSERT 和 DELETE 语句，返回值为该命令所影响的行数。For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command. 对于其他所有类型的语句，返回值为 -1。For all other types of statements, the return value is -1. ## Examples 下面的示例创建派生类的实例，然后执行它。The following example creates an instance of the derived class, , and then executes it. 若要完成此操作，该方法传递为 SQL SELECT 语句的字符串和要用于连接到数据源的字符串。To accomplish this, the method is passed a string that is a SQL SELECT statement and a string to use to connect to the data source. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The connection does not exist.
-or-
The connection is not open.

span.span: One of the values.

summary.span: 对 执行 ，并使用 值之一生成 。

span.span: Executes the against the , and builds an using one of the values.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方必须调用方法的属性。The caller must call the method of the property. 当属性设置为`StoredProcedure`，则属性应设置为存储过程的名称。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the property should be set to the name of the stored procedure. 该命令执行此存储的过程调用时。The command executes this stored procedure when you call . > [!NOTE] > 使用检索大值和二进制数据。Use to retrieve large values and binary data. 否则为可能会出现，连接将被关闭。Otherwise, an might occur and the connection will be closed. 虽然正在使用中，关联是繁忙的服务。While the is in use, the associated is busy serving the . 在此状态下，没有其他操作可以执行上而不关闭它。While in this state, no other operations can be performed on the other than closing it. 这种情况直到调用 DataReader 的方法。This is the case until the method of the DataReader is called. 如果使用创建 DataReader设置为`CloseConnection`，关闭 DataReader 自动关闭的连接。If the DataReader is created with set to `CloseConnection`, closing the DataReader closes the connection automatically.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object ExecuteScalar() cil managed

summary.span: 执行查询，并返回由查询返回的结果集中第一行的第一列。

span.span: Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the resultset returned by the query.
Extra columns or rows are ignored.

returns.span: 结果集中第一行的第一列。

span.span: The first column of the first row in the resultset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以从数据库中检索单个值 （例如，一个聚合值）。Use the method to retrieve a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database. 这需要比使用更少的代码方法，以及执行生成使用返回的数据的单个值所必需的操作。This requires less code than using the method, and then performing the operations necessary to generate the single value using the data returned by an . 典型查询可设置格式如以下 C# 示例所示：A typical query can be formatted as in the following C# example: ``` CommandText = "select count(*) as NumberOfRegions from region"; Int32 count = (int) ExecuteScalar(); ``` 如果结果集中的第一行的第一列未找到，则为 null 引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 返回。If the first column of the first row in the result set is not found, a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) is returned. 如果在数据库中的值是`null`，该查询将返回`DBNull.Value`。If the value in the database is `null`, the query returns `DBNull.Value`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建派生类的实例，然后执行它使用。The following example creates an instance of the derived class, , and then executes it using . 该示例是返回聚合结果，一个 TRANSACT-SQL 语句的字符串和要用于连接到数据源的字符串传递。The example is passed a string that is a Transact-SQL statement that returns an aggregate result, and a string to use to connect to the data source. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlCommand.ExecuteScalar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlCommand.ExecuteScalar/CS/mysample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlCommand.ExecuteScalar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlCommand.ExecuteScalar/VB/mysample.vb#1)]

[!code-csharp[Classic WebData IDbCommand.Parameters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData IDbCommand.Parameters Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData IDbCommand.Parameters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData IDbCommand.Parameters Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Prepare() cil managed

summary.span: 在数据源上创建准备就绪（或已编译）的命令版本。

span.span: Creates a prepared (or compiled) version of the command on the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`TableDirect`，不执行任何操作。If the property is set to `TableDirect`, does nothing. 如果设置为`StoredProcedure`，在调用应该会成功，虽然它可能会不导致执行任何操作。If is set to `StoredProcedure`, the call to should succeed, although it may result in a no-op. 服务器会自动缓存以供重复使用，根据需要; 计划因此，没有无需直接在客户端应用程序中调用此方法。The server automatically caches plans for reuse as necessary; therefore, there is no need to call this method directly in your client application. ## Examples 下面的示例创建派生类的实例，并打开该连接。The following example creates an instance of the derived class, , and opens the connection. 该示例然后准备数据源上的存储的过程通过将为 SQL Select 语句的字符串以及要用于连接到数据源的字符串传递。The example then prepares a stored procedure on the data source by passing a string that is a SQL Select statement and a string to use to connect to the data source. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Prepare Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Prepare Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Prepare Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Prepare Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
